SEARCH
Package sttrswing.model

Class Stat

Object
Stat
public class Stat extends Object
Stat wraps a numerical int value, with a minimum and maximum value enforced inclusively. i.e. if you pass in a current value of 2 and a maximum value of 2, current will become 2 This implementation of Stat assumes the minimum value is always 0.

  • Constructor Details

    • Stat

      public Stat(int current, int max)
      Constructs a Stat instance.
      Parameters:
      current - - amount to set the current value of the Stat to, minimum and maximum bounds will be enforced on construction.
      max - - amount to set the maximum value of the Stat to, used in boundary enforcement.
